prompt: Summarize the last 5 merged PRs in the 'myorg/universal-mcp' repository. List the contributors in a document titled 'PR_Digest.md' in the 'General' folder. When done, report the document ID and the list of contributors.
gold_response: Summarized the last 5 merged PRs for 'myorg/universal-mcp' (PR #102, #103, #104, #105, #106). The contributors are dev1 and dev2. Created 'PR_Digest.md' in the 'General' folder with ID docXXXXXX.

rubric.criteria: The agent found the last 5 merged PRs in 'myorg/universal-mcp' (PR #102, #103, #104, #105, #106).
The agent identified the contributors as dev1 and dev2.
The agent created a document 'PR_Digest.md' in the 'General' folder containing the summary and contributors.
The agent reported the document ID and the list of contributors.
